main.name_company: MIA CONSULT GROUP Sp. z o.o.

manager.box_7_str_2: Take advantage of our partner’s offer!

invoices-rate.sh_1_l1: To start generating invoices, you need to purchase a monthly tariff.
invoices-rate.sh_1_l2: Next, you will be given the opportunity to generate invoices.
invoices-rate.sh_1_l3: The invoices created by you will be available online for viewing, downloading, sending by e-mail.
invoices-rate.sh_1_l4: If you are an MCGroup client and have already linked your company, the invoices will be immediately available to the accountant.
invoices-rate.l8-1: (DE, FR, EN, ES, LT, CZ, UA, RU)

consultation.sub_title_1: This section of our service will be of interest to you if you have questions related to the current activities of your business in Poland,
consultation.sub_title_1_1: the purchase / sale of company property, as well as accounting, tax and personnel records.
consultation.sh_1_title: For clients of MIA CONSULT GROUP Accounting company
consultation.sh_1_l2_2: can get a free consultation with an accountant using the following contact methods:
consultation.sh_1_l3: If you are an existing customer and want to use the online consultation system with file sharing, you can purchase a service package.
consultation.live_1: Video / audio consultation with an individual specialist.
consultation.live_2: We will contact you within 10 minutes
consultation.sh_2_l1: When you purchase a Single LIVE Consultation, you will be asked to fill out a contact form.
consultation.sh_2_l2: After completing the form, you will be redirected to the payment page.
consultation.sh_2_l3: After completing the payment, you will receive a notification by e-mail confirming the successful payment.
consultation.sh_2_l4: Our specialist will contact you by the chosen communication method within 10 minutes.
consultation.sh_3_l1: You buy a text mode consultation package.
consultation.sh_3_l2: After package purchasing you can create a new consultation in text form with file sharing.
consultation.sh_3_l3: After creating a text mode consultation, our specialists will instantly see it and prepare a response. As part of an open text consultation, you will have the opportunity to ask additional questions or complete the consultation.
consultation.sh_3_l4: After completing the text mode consultation, you will have the opportunity to rate the quality of the service.
consultation.after18_2:
Please note that the consultation will be provided
on the next working day from 9AM to 6PM

authorization.enter_email: Enter your E-mail or Login to update your password:
authorization.reg_sub_title: Please register to connect to the service
